entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the twins who flew to freedom. He is described as making sure nobody would forget them soon.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of the twins who flew to freedom. He is described as making sure nobody would forget them soon.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who can tell the story of Fred and George's flight to freedom would become a legend at Hogwarts.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as being pelted with Dung-bombs by Fred and George on their brooms.

entities.name: hogwarts legend
entities.description: Hogwarts legend is mentioned as the story of Fred and George's flight to freedom becoming a part of it.

relationships.description: Fred and George are described as twins, indicating they are siblings.
Harry is mentioned as someone who can tell the story of Fred and George's flight to freedom would become a legend at Hogwarts.
